    public class HivePurgerConverter
extends Converter<PurgeableHivePartitionDatasetSchema,PurgeableHivePartitionDatasetSchema,PurgeableHivePartitionDataset,PurgeableHivePartitionDataset>
    A Converter to build compliance purge queries. Queries are added to the PurgeableHivePartitionDataset.
